short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables the ST Kaiti font if the Google Forms contain any Chinese Characters!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension allows you to use the ST Kaiti font in Google Forms instead of the default font, making forms with chinese characters in them a lot more readable than usual.
